channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree overhanging hedge causing damage, 18th July
item.description:
This tree is blocking late afternoon sunlight to our garden to be able to use our pool. It’s also blocking light to our hedge, so has killed a large area of this. We’ve tried regrowing two conifers to fill the gap but they don’t get enough light to survive & we now have a large gab in our hedge on the Old Bath Road side. We don’t want this tree to get any bigger, causing more damage to our hedge & further blocking the sunshine into our garden. We are happy to pay for any work ourselves to reduce the size of this tree as I understand this is not something the Highways would pay for?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard shell is damaged/vandalised (Non illuminating bollard or post) problem, 18th July
item.description:
Please pass to relevant ahr covering this area. Bollard next to bus stopis loose in foundations. This may fall on private land. Please investigate further and determine ownership and instruct for permanent repair.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Bollard shell is damaged/vandalised (Non illuminating bollard or post)

item.title: There is vegitation hanging out dangerous, 18th July
item.description:
